data.name: AddFavorite
data.comment: Add to favorites button text which is displayed on success card

data.name: AddFavTaskModuleSubtitle
data.comment: Subtitle for task module for managing favorite rooms

data.name: AnotherRoomTaskModuleSubtitle
data.comment: Subtitle for task module for searching and booking of other rooms

data.name: Available
data.comment: Available label text

data.name: BookRoom
data.comment: Book room button text

data.name: BuildingName
data.comment: Building name label text

data.name: CancelMeeting
data.comment: Cancel meeting button text used to display on success card

data.name: CantLogIn
data.value: We couldn't log you in. Please try again later.
data.comment: Login failure error message

data.name: CommandNotRecognized
data.value: Cannot recognize **{command}** as valid command. Please type 'Help' to see all available commands.
data.comment: Message which will be displayed if user types command unknown to bot

data.name: ExceptionResponse
data.value: Something went wrong and I can’t do that right now. Try again in a few minutes.
data.comment: Generic error message

data.name: Expired
data.value: Room availability is outdated. Please refresh card and try again.
data.comment: Message to be displayed if user tries to book room from old card

data.name: FavoriteRoomExist
data.value: That room is already one of your favorites.
data.comment: Message to be displayed if user tries to add existing favorite room as favorite

data.name: FavoriteRoomsModified
data.value: Modified favorite rooms list. Please refresh.
data.comment: Message to be displayed if favorite list card can not update

data.name: LoggedInSuccess
data.comment: Login success message

data.name: LogoutSuccess
data.comment: Logout message

data.name: ManageFavorites
data.comment: Manage favorites button text

data.name: MeetingBody
data.comment: Meeting body which will be sent in create event request to graph api

data.name: MeetingCancelled
data.comment: Text which will be shown to user after cancellation of meeting

data.name: MeetingSubject
data.comment: Meeting subject

data.name: MeetingTimeElapsed
data.value: The meeting end time has elapsed.
data.comment: Message to be displayed while trying to cancel lapsed meeting

data.name: NoFavoriteRooms
data.value: No favorite rooms yet. Add some for faster booking. Or, select more rooms to choose from the directory.
data.comment: Label displayed on favorite rooms list card if there are no rooms in favorite list

data.name: OtherRooms
data.comment: More rooms button text

data.name: Refresh
data.comment: Refresh button text

data.name: Room
data.comment: Room label

data.name: RoomAddedAsFavorite
data.comment: Message to show once user adds room to favorites

data.name: RoomAvailability
data.comment: Favorite rooms list card title

data.name: RoomUnavailable
data.value: That room isn’t available. Select a different one.
data.comment: Message to show if user tries to book unavailable room

data.name: SearchRoom
data.comment: Search room or building

data.name: Share
data.comment: Share button text

data.name: SignIn
data.comment: Sign in button text

data.name: SignInRequired
data.comment: Sign in card title

data.name: UnableToAddFavorite
data.value: I couldn't add the room to your favorites. Try again later.
data.comment: Message to show after failure while adding room to favorites

data.name: Unavailable
data.comment: Unavailable label

data.name: WelcomeCardContent
data.value: I help you to quickly book a room for your meeting on the go
data.comment: Welcome card main content

data.name: WelcomeCardTitle
data.comment: Welcome label

data.name: InvalidTenant
data.value: You're not authorized to access this bot. Please contact your administrator for help.
data.comment: Message to be showed if tenant id doesn't match with authorized tenant

data.name: RoomBooked
data.comment: Message to show after successful booking of room

data.name: ManageFavoriteCardDescription
data.value: Click on the button below to add or remove rooms from your favorites list.
data.comment: Manage favorites card description

data.name: DateFormat
data.comment: Date format to be displayed on success and cancel meeting card where {0} is for date {1} is for time and {2} is for total minute.

data.name: MeetingBooked
data.comment: Success card header

data.name: WelcomeCardContentPart1
data.value: **Book room** : Book your favorite room for a default duration of 30 mins
data.comment: Welcome card book room command description

data.name: WelcomeCardContentPart2
data.value: **Manage favorites** : Add rooms as favorites to help you to quick book them later
data.comment: Welcome card manage favorites command description

data.name: CancellationComment
data.value: Meeting is cancelled by organizer using Book-a-room bot.
data.comment: Comment to be sent to graph api while cancelling meeting.

data.name: AddButton
data.comment: Add button in manage favorites page

data.name: CantAddMoreRooms
data.value: You cannot add more than 15 rooms to your favorites.
data.comment: Error message to show if user tries to add more than 15 rooms to favorites in client app

data.name: DoneButton
data.comment: Done button in client app

data.name: Location
data.comment: Location label used in manage favorites

data.name: SelectRoomToAdd
data.value: Select room to add to your favorites.
data.comment: Error message to show if user tries to add room to favorite with empty selection in client app

data.name: LoadingMessage
data.comment: Loading message to be displayed while time zones loads in dropdown

data.name: MeetingLength
data.comment: Meeting length label for other rooms task module

data.name: NoFavoriteRoomsTaskModule
data.comment: Message to show when user has no favorite rooms to display

data.name: SearchRoomDropdownPlaceholder
data.comment: Placeholder for search room dropdown for task module

data.name: SelectDurationRoom
data.comment: Error to show when user tries to book room without selection

data.name: SelectTimezone
data.comment: Placeholder for time zone selection dropdown

data.name: Timezone
data.comment: Time zone label

data.name: TimezoneNotSupported
data.value: The detected time zone is not supported. Please select a time zone to proceed.
data.comment: Error message to be displayed when user local time zone doesn't match with supported time zones in task module

data.name: NoFavoritesDescriptionTaskModule
data.value: Add a room to your list of favorites to get started.
data.comment: Message to display if there are no favorite rooms found for user in task module
